entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Need better docs on Mac signing #30681
  • Console project template - missing space in German translation for top level statements #30676
  • Github Release page not up to date #30671
  • Workload experience for out-of-tree workloads poor, especially on upgrades #30661

Closed

  • Packaging .NET tool includes unused transitive dependency System.Drawing.Common #30670

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30680
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30679
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert MSBuild to match VS 17.5.0 GA #30674
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [GenAPI] Add abstract modifier for an abstract event. #30672
    Area-GenAPI

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30645
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30635
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #30657
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Downgrade errors for specifying `--output` for solutions to warnings #30660
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2116243 #30412
    Area-Infrastructure
  • GenAPI: add workaround for IFieldSymbol.Name that has angle brackets #30572
    Area-GenAPI
  • [GenAPI] Synthesize an internal default constructor for the type with implicit default constructor and the base type without. #30594
    Area-GenAPI
  • Introduce `Workload Clean`: Garbage Collection Component #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
